links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part One

wikitext.*:
'''Narquelië''' was the tenth month of the year, according to the [[Kings' Reckoning|Kings']] and [[Stewards' Reckoning]] of [[Gondor]], and the seventh month according to the [[New Reckoning]]; following the month of [[Yavannië]] in the [[Kings' Reckoning]], the harvest feast of [[Yáviérë]] in the Stewards' Reckoning, the [[Enderi]] in the New Reckoning, and preceding [[Hísimë]] in all 3 calendars. Narquelië in the Kings' and Stewards' Reckoning corresponded to [[Winterfilth]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[22 September]] through [[21 October]]).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>
==Etymology==
''Narquelië'' is a [[Quenya]] word meaning "Sun-fading".<ref name=K3>{{LT1|Kortirion3}}, p. 41</ref>
==Cognates==
*''[[Narquelion]]''<ref name=K3/>
